item.description:
Max's Oyster Bar was such a hit that Kathe volunteered to Organize it this time. Let's do it again!

Max's Oyster Bar, featuring modern renditions of classic American seafood, Maxâ€™s Oyster Bar menu has something for everyone. While seafood is the focal point, there are selections for even the most ardent landlubber. Ethnic influences are apparent throughout a menu filled with new interpretations on traditional fare. The raw bar offers an extensive variety of bi-coastal oysters and shellfish.

Check their website 02/08/09 or later to see the pre-fix and menu specials: http://maxrestaurantg...

Town parking lot (inexpensive!) is in the rear, or if you're lucky, you might find a place on the street.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: MAX'S OYSTER BAR 02/10/09 7:00PM
